name: ConfigServiceV2Client
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
V2
ConfigServiceV2Client
description: Service for configuring sinks used to export log entries outside of Stackdriver Logging.

methods.name: project_path
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
V2
ConfigServiceV2Client.project_path
methods.description: Returns a fully-qualified project resource name string.

methods.name: sink_path
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
V2
ConfigServiceV2Client.sink_path
methods.description: Returns a fully-qualified sink resource name string.

methods.name: match_project_from_project_name
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
V2
ConfigServiceV2Client.match_project_from_project_name
methods.description: Parses the project from a project resource.

methods.name: match_project_from_sink_name
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
V2
ConfigServiceV2Client.match_project_from_sink_name
methods.description: Parses the project from a sink resource.

methods.name: match_sink_from_sink_name
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
V2
ConfigServiceV2Client.match_sink_from_sink_name
methods.description: Parses the sink from a sink resource.

params.name: service_path
params.description: The domain name of the API remote host.

params.name: port
params.description: The port on which to connect to the remote host.

params.name: channel
params.description: A Channel object through which to make calls.

params.name: chan_creds
params.description: A ChannelCredentials for the setting up the RPC client.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A Hash for call options for each method. See
Google::Gax#construct_settings for the structure of
this data. Falls back to the default config if not specified
or the specified config is missing data points.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The default timeout, in seconds, for calls made through this client.

params.name: app_name
params.description: The codename of the calling service.

params.name: app_version
params.description: The version of the calling service.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging/v2/config_service_v2_client"

ConfigServiceV2Client = Google::Cloud::Logging::V2::ConfigServiceV2Client

config_service_v2_client = ConfigServiceV2Client.new
formatted_parent = ConfigServiceV2Client.project_path("[PROJECT]")

# Iterate over all results.
config_service_v2_client.list_sinks(formatted_parent).each do |element|
  # Process element.
end

# Or iterate over results one page at a time.
config_service_v2_client.list_sinks(formatted_parent).each_page do |page|
  # Process each page at a time.
  page.each do |element|
    # Process element.
  end
end

params.name: parent
params.description:
Required. The resource name where this sink was created:

"projects/[PROJECT_ID]"
"organizations/[ORGANIZATION_ID]"

params.name: page_size
params.description:
The maximum number of resources contained in the underlying API
response. If page streaming is performed per-resource, this
parameter does not affect the return value. If page streaming is
performed per-page, this determines the maximum number of
resources in a page.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

returns.description:
An enumerable of Google::Logging::V2::LogSink instances.
See Google::Gax::PagedEnumerable documentation for other
operations such as per-page iteration or access to the response
object.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging/v2/config_service_v2_client"

ConfigServiceV2Client = Google::Cloud::Logging::V2::ConfigServiceV2Client

config_service_v2_client = ConfigServiceV2Client.new
formatted_sink_name = ConfigServiceV2Client.sink_path("[PROJECT]", "[SINK]")
response = config_service_v2_client.get_sink(formatted_sink_name)

params.name: sink_name
params.description:
Required. The resource name of the sink to return:

"projects/[PROJECT_ID]/sinks/[SINK_ID]"
"organizations/[ORGANIZATION_ID]/sinks/[SINK_ID]"

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging/v2/config_service_v2_client"

ConfigServiceV2Client = Google::Cloud::Logging::V2::ConfigServiceV2Client
LogSink = Google::Logging::V2::LogSink

config_service_v2_client = ConfigServiceV2Client.new
formatted_parent = ConfigServiceV2Client.project_path("[PROJECT]")
sink = LogSink.new
response = config_service_v2_client.create_sink(formatted_parent, sink)

params.name: parent
params.description:
Required. The resource in which to create the sink:

"projects/[PROJECT_ID]"
"organizations/[ORGANIZATION_ID]"

params.name: sink
params.description:
Required. The new sink, whose +name+ parameter is a sink identifier that
is not already in use.

params.name: unique_writer_identity
params.description:
Optional. Whether the sink will have a dedicated service account returned
in the sink’s writer_identity. Set this field to be true to export
logs from one project to a different project. This field is ignored for
non-project sinks (e.g. organization sinks) because those sinks are
required to have dedicated service accounts.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging/v2/config_service_v2_client"

ConfigServiceV2Client = Google::Cloud::Logging::V2::ConfigServiceV2Client
LogSink = Google::Logging::V2::LogSink

config_service_v2_client = ConfigServiceV2Client.new
formatted_sink_name = ConfigServiceV2Client.sink_path("[PROJECT]", "[SINK]")
sink = LogSink.new
response = config_service_v2_client.update_sink(formatted_sink_name, sink)

params.name: sink_name
params.description:
Required. The resource name of the sink to update, including the parent resource and the sink identifier:

"projects/[PROJECT_ID]/sinks/[SINK_ID]"
"organizations/[ORGANIZATION_ID]/sinks/[SINK_ID]"

Example: +”projects/my-project-id/sinks/my-sink-id”+.

params.name: sink
params.description:
Required. The updated sink, whose name is the same identifier that appears
as part of +sinkName+.  If +sinkName+ does not exist, then
this method creates a new sink.

params.name: unique_writer_identity
params.description:
Optional. Whether the sink will have a dedicated service account returned
in the sink’s writer_identity. Set this field to be true to export
logs from one project to a different project. This field is ignored for
non-project sinks (e.g. organization sinks) because those sinks are
required to have dedicated service accounts.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

params.name: sink_name
params.description:
Required. The resource name of the sink to delete, including the parent resource and the sink identifier:

"projects/[PROJECT_ID]/sinks/[SINK_ID]"
"organizations/[ORGANIZATION_ID]/sinks/[SINK_ID]"

It is an error if the sink does not exist.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.
